column2: IDEA-90507 Close tabs to the right

column3: Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please specify your real name (preferrably in commit data as well) and I'll send you an e-mail with the CLA to sign. Thanks.
No, I don't. I specified the real name in the GitHub profile.
Please check your inbox: I've just send there the CLA to sign. Thanks.

@vvv1559 Actually you shouldn't operate window.getSelectedEditor() because with right-click you get context menu for 'context' file and not 'selected' file. Anyway, thank you, the issue IDEA-90507 seems to be fixed!
Feature close tab to the left/to the right realization.
